name: Selfless Giant Turtle
desc: "Giant Turtle's Breath" appears in Action Order: When taking action, increases DMG taken by all enemies by 50%, lasting 3 turns, performs 3 Barrages on all enemies, dealing Ice and Fire DMG equal to 6000% of base DMG, delays their actions by 30%, and reduces 30 Toughness from all enemy targets ignoring Weakness Type. When Weakness Break occurs on an enemy, triggers both Ice and Fire Weakness Break effects. When ally target activates Ultimate with "Brain in a Vat," "Giant Turtle's Breath" action advances by 15%.
